name: The Grand Finale
description:
Welcome to the circus!

The Grand Finale tells the story of a clown: Zippy. He has joined the circus and after some great shows, there was a problem. The magician named Carter, was mad at him. With all his jokes and magic tricks, he had stolen his place in the show.

Carter devised an evil plan, he hypnotised the circus crew and set them against him. Join Zippy on his journey to help the crew and rescue the circus!

Explore four worlds, meet friendly characters, search for collectibles and fight bosses. Use your tricks to attack and learn more spells along the way!

The game is completely free to play, but any donation would be very appreciated! This really helps me to keep making games for everyone to play!


The game is also available for Android devices. There is a link to the Google play store below.
